description: Faint from fever, the young woman rests her head on a pillow. Is she perhaps lovesick? Is she pregnant? To find out, a quack would put a strip of his patient’s clothing in a brazier to smoulder – the scent would disclose her secret. Jan Steen here presents such a charlatan making a diagnosis. His old-fashioned attire characterizes him as a comic character.
null: comic character charlatan fever quack secret young woman jan steen head strip patient’s clothing brazier pillow scent old-fashioned attire
author: Jan Havicksz Steen
